There's two files in this torrent. One has to overwrite the element.aex file the other has to be selected anytime you start element in a new session of After Effects. Just select the "a.license" file and whait a second or two. Now you can use the Scene Setup button in Element. Have fun until the cracks arrives.

Read the name of this torrent before asking....

Element3D (Scene Setup Crack No Render Yet) 

NO RENDER YET means you can't see it in the comp, but you can do anything inside the scene setup, try models and play with what's already there.

Using the Pro Shaders package you can recreate the shaders manually once at a time. Just duplicate a shader, rename it and select three files (diffusion, specular and normal). Save it and click on the pro shader folder. Click on the litte arrow and you should see a second folder. Your new material is there.
Now do it for all the shaders.... :-) or whait for the crack...
